extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.couchbase.GetCouchbaseKey
extension.description: Get a document from Couchbase Server via Key/Value access. The ID of the document to fetch may be supplied by setting the <Document Id> property. NOTE: if the Document Id property is not set, the contents of the FlowFile will be read to determine the Document Id, which means that the contents of the entire FlowFile will be buffered in memory.

property.name: cluster-controller-service
property.description: A Couchbase Cluster Controller Service which manages connections to a Couchbase cluster.

property.name: bucket-name
property.description: The name of bucket to access.

property.name: document-type
property.description: The type of contents.

property.name: document-id
property.description: A static, fixed Couchbase document id, or an expression to construct the Couchbase document id.

property.name: put-to-attribute
property.description: If set, the retrieved value will be put into an attribute of the FlowFile instead of a the content of the FlowFile. The attribute key to put to is determined by evaluating value of this property.

relationship.name: retry
relationship.description: All FlowFiles failed to fetch from Couchbase Server but can be retried are routed to this relationship.

relationship.name: success
relationship.description: Values retrieved from Couchbase Server are written as outgoing FlowFiles content or put into an attribute of the incoming FlowFile and routed to this relationship.

relationship.name: failure
relationship.description: All FlowFiles failed to fetch from Couchbase Server and not retry-able are routed to this relationship.

relationship.name: original
relationship.description: The original input FlowFile is routed to this relationship when the value is retrieved from Couchbase Server and routed to 'success'.

writesAttribute.name: couchbase.cluster
writesAttribute.description: Cluster where the document was retrieved from.

writesAttribute.name: couchbase.bucket
writesAttribute.description: Bucket where the document was retrieved from.

writesAttribute.name: couchbase.exception
writesAttribute.description: If Couchbase related error occurs the CouchbaseException class name will be captured here.

systemResourceConsideration.description: An instance of this component can cause high usage of this system resource. Multiple instances or high concurrency settings may result a degradation of performance.

extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.couchbase.PutCouchbaseKey
extension.description: Put a document to Couchbase Server via Key/Value access.

property.name: cluster-controller-service
property.description: A Couchbase Cluster Controller Service which manages connections to a Couchbase cluster.

property.name: bucket-name
property.description: The name of bucket to access.

property.name: document-type
property.description: The type of contents.

property.name: document-id
property.description: A static, fixed Couchbase document id, or an expression to construct the Couchbase document id.

property.name: persist-to
property.description: Durability constraint about disk persistence.

property.name: replicate-to
property.description: Durability constraint about replication.

relationship.name: retry
relationship.description: All FlowFiles failed to be written to Couchbase Server but can be retried are routed to this relationship.

relationship.name: success
relationship.description: All FlowFiles that are written to Couchbase Server are routed to this relationship.

relationship.name: failure
relationship.description: All FlowFiles failed to be written to Couchbase Server and not retry-able are routed to this relationship.

readsAttribute.name: uuid
readsAttribute.description: Used as a document id if 'Document Id' is not specified

writesAttribute.name: couchbase.cluster
writesAttribute.description: Cluster where the document was stored.

writesAttribute.name: couchbase.bucket
writesAttribute.description: Bucket where the document was stored.

writesAttribute.name: couchbase.exception
writesAttribute.description: If Couchbase related error occurs the CouchbaseException class name will be captured here.

systemResourceConsideration.description: An instance of this component can cause high usage of this system resource. Multiple instances or high concurrency settings may result a degradation of performance.

extension.name: org.apache.nifi.couchbase.CouchbaseClusterService
extension.description: Provides a centralized Couchbase connection and bucket passwords management. Bucket passwords can be specified via dynamic properties.

property.name: Connection String
property.description: The hostnames or ip addresses of the bootstraping nodes and optional parameters. Syntax) couchbase://node1,node2,nodeN?param1=value1&param2=value2&paramN=valueN

property.name: user-name
property.description: The user name to authenticate NiFi as a Couchbase client. This configuration can be used against Couchbase Server 5.0 or later supporting Roll-Based Access Control.

property.name: user-password
property.description: The user password to authenticate NiFi as a Couchbase client. This configuration can be used against Couchbase Server 5.0 or later supporting Roll-Based Access Control.

dynamicProperty.name: Bucket Password for BUCKET_NAME
dynamicProperty.description: Specify bucket password if necessary. Couchbase Server 5.0 or later should use 'User Name' and 'User Password' instead.

extension.name: org.apache.nifi.couchbase.CouchbaseKeyValueLookupService
extension.description: Lookup a string value from Couchbase Server associated with the specified key. The coordinates that are passed to the lookup must contain the key 'key'.

property.name: cluster-controller-service
property.description: A Couchbase Cluster Controller Service which manages connections to a Couchbase cluster.

property.name: bucket-name
property.description: The name of bucket to access.

property.name: lookup-sub-doc-path
property.description: The Sub-Document lookup path within the target JSON document.

extension.name: org.apache.nifi.couchbase.CouchbaseMapCacheClient
extension.description: Provides the ability to communicate with a Couchbase Server cluster as a DistributedMapCacheServer. This can be used in order to share a Map between nodes in a NiFi cluster. Couchbase Server cluster can provide a high available and persistent cache storage.

property.name: cluster-controller-service
property.description: A Couchbase Cluster Controller Service which manages connections to a Couchbase cluster.

property.name: bucket-name
property.description: The name of bucket to access.

extension.name: org.apache.nifi.couchbase.CouchbaseRecordLookupService
extension.description: Lookup a record from Couchbase Server associated with the specified key. The coordinates that are passed to the lookup must contain the key 'key'.

property.name: cluster-controller-service
property.description: A Couchbase Cluster Controller Service which manages connections to a Couchbase cluster.

property.name: bucket-name
property.description: The name of bucket to access.

property.name: document-type
property.description: The type of contents.

property.name: record-reader
property.description: The Record Reader to use for parsing fetched document from Couchbase Server.
